HollowMod:VesselMask.NAME: Knight's Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #ySoul each time you play an Attack card. (Except #bSpell or #bAlly Attacks)

HollowMod:PlaceholderRelic.NAME: Placeholder Energy Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 [E].

HollowMod:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

HollowMod:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
HollowMod:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]turn.[] NL #yEvoke your rightmost Orb.
YOU ARE MINE!

HollowMod:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

HollowMod:VoidIdolRelic.NAME: Void Idol
HollowMod:VoidIdolRelic.FLAVOR: A Mask formed of liquid from the Abyss, perfectly still.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Vessel's Mask or King's Soul. You can no longer Gain #ySoul. [#696969]Void[] cards lose #yExhaust. At the beginning of each combat, #r-1 #yDexterity, #r-1 #yStrength.

HollowMod:QueensCombRelic.NAME: Queens Comb
HollowMod:QueensCombRelic.FLAVOR: Golden nugget of the Hive's precious comb.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon Pickup #rLose #r50% #rMax #rHP. Until you take health damage each combat: At the beginning of your turn: heal for #g
#gHP.

HollowMod:LifeEnderRelic.NAME: Life Ender
HollowMod:LifeEnderRelic.FLAVOR: Another fool to be cut down by Life Ender...
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw a card after playing #b5 attacks.

HollowMod:MillibellesNoteRelic.NAME: Millibelle's Note
HollowMod:MillibellesNoteRelic.FLAVOR: Still not interested? You're far too hesitant.
DESCRIPTIONS: Begin each combat with #b2 #ySoul.

HollowMod:MantisClawRelic.NAME: Mantis Claw
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b3 [#60CFFF]Dash cards in one turn, gain #b1 [E]

HollowMod:JonisBlessing.NAME: Joni's Blessing
HollowMod:JonisBlessing.FLAVOR: Blessed by Joni, the kindly heretic. Transfigures vital fluids into blue lifeblood.
DESCRIPTIONS: Begin each combat with #b15 Temporary_HP. Healing in combat instead increases Temporary_HP.)

HollowMod:IsmasTear.NAME: Isma's Tear
HollowMod:IsmasTear.FLAVOR: Fruit formed from a single hardened tear.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever[#FFA200]Infection damages you, take #b1 less damage.

HollowMod:DelicateFlower.NAME: Delicate Flower
HollowMod:DelicateFlower.FLAVOR: The Grey Mourner sends her Love.
DESCRIPTIONS: If your HP is Full, gain Max Soul at the Beginning of Each turn.

HollowMod:KingsBrand.NAME: The King's Brand
HollowMod:KingsBrand.FLAVOR: Hallownest's ancient places shall open before it.
DESCRIPTIONS: As long as you have enough [#FFA200]Infection, [#EFFAFF]Focus[] will spend [#FFA200]Infection instead of #ySoul (Even while in [#696969]Void[]).

HollowMod:StagPassRelic.NAME: Stag's Pass
HollowMod:StagPassRelic.FLAVOR: The sound of the bell will always call me back.
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards Purchased from Shops are automatically upgraded.

HollowMod:KingsSoulRelic.NAME: King's Soul
HollowMod:KingsSoulRelic.FLAVOR: Holy charm symbolising a union between higher beings.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Vessel Mask or [#696969]Void[] Idol. Gain #b3 #ySoul at the beginning of each round, increase #ySoul #yMeter by #b2

HollowMod:GodTunerRelic.NAME: GodTuner
HollowMod:GodTunerRelic.FLAVOR: Device that resonates with beings of great power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 [E] at the start of each turn. #ySoul #yMeter #yLimit is reduced by #b3.

HollowMod:GreatKnightMask.NAME: The Great Knight's Mask
HollowMod:GreatKnightMask.FLAVOR: Fear not, cur... Your death will be swift
DESCRIPTIONS: Zote needs no effect.
